name: Frog Lake DEMO
description:
Welcome to the open DEMO

The controlls are:

Walking: WASD or Arrow keys or (XBOX Thumbstick)
Interact: Z or J or (XBOX A)
Menu: X or K  or (XBOX X)
Cancel/Inventory: C or L or (XBOX Y)

Also has Controller support

Join the playtesters discord here: https://discord.gg/sruugYu3y7

Made by: Jalecko
Music by: Maahlie
Extra art by: Sebbe
